headline: Ethos and Aflac Partner to Bring Supplemental Health Product Suite to Independent Distribution
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, Dec. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Ethos, a leading life insurance technology company democratizing access to life insurance, today announced a partnership with Aflac Incorporated (NYSE: AFL), a leading provider of supplemental health insurance in the U.S., to expand access to Aflac’s supplemental insurance policies through Ethos’s digital distribution platform. The collaboration launches with Aflac’s cancer insurance, now available alongside Ethos’s life insurance offerings, expan
